title: Clannad - Past Pressent
description:
From Amazon:

One of Clannad&#039;s most popular albums, this greatest hits compilation features the band&#039;s rock edge as well as its softer ambient music sensibility. 1985&#039;s "Closer to Your Heart", from the album MACALLA, was Clannad&#039;s attempt to break into the pop market. Here the electric guitar solo, while dated-sounding, shows off the superb skill of special guest Anton Drennan, while Maire Brennan&#039;s voice is particularly inspired.

Other hits, such as "Theme from Harry&#039;s Game" and "Robin (The Hooded Man)" come from music Clannad recorded for theeponymous British television series. The former, with its lush vocal choir, is one of the band&#039;s most haunting ambient/new age tunes. Finally, "Something to Believe In" features the vocals and piano playing of Bruce Hornsby, and is smartlyco-produced by former Jackson Browne drummer, Russ Kunkel. A must for fans, PASTPRESENT is also a good starting point for neophytes.


Track Listings
1. Harry&#039;s Game
2. Closer To Your Heart
3. Almost Seems (Too Late To Turn)
4. Hunter
5. Lady Marian
6. Sirius
7. Coinleach Glas An Fhomhair
8. Second Nature
9. World Of Difference
10. In A Lifetime
11. Robin (The Hooded Man)
12. Something To Believe In
13. Newgrange
14. Buachaill An Eirne
15. White Fool
16. Stepping Stone

Individually tracked, all ID tagged and named. THE WAY IT SHOULD BE DONE!
